name: Pathfinder Games - Pathfinder
description:
Play as the Pathfinder Mars rover and ensure the local colonies survival by solving their water troubles.

Controls:

W/LMB - Accelerate

S/RMB - Decelerate

A/D - Steer

LMB - Interact

We decided to base this game around the idea of water found on mars being a valuable resource and two colonies cant come to an agreement on how the resource should be split among them. 

The player must make a decision on dividing the resources between two colonies, one who squanders their resource and uses it for leisure, and one who uses it as intended.

The game provides 4 different endings based on the players actions.
